summary: Implemented an authenticated onboarding flow as a new TanStack Router route (/onboarding) with an auto-launcher that redirects first-time authenticated users (after profile is available) to onboarding, persists dismissal/completion in localStorage, and provides a footer link to re-open onboarding. Diff summary also indicates additional unrelated changes to generator/calendar files not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to multiple generator libraries and generator UI to adjust backend type mappings (e.g., Difficulty enum imports, null properties, TrendCategory/HookType mappings) unrelated to onboarding.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a first-time user onboarding screen/flow (REQ-9/10/11) and explicitly noted non-goals about not redesigning other features beyond linking from onboarding. The diff summary includes changes to generator implementation details that are not required to add onboarding.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/lib/reelIdeasGenerator.ts, frontend/src/lib/hookGenerator.ts, frontend/src/lib/captionGenerator.ts, frontend/src/lib/trendGenerator.ts, frontend/src/components/generators/ScriptGenerator.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to calendar dialog/page behavior (e.g., PostStatus enum handling, scheduling/manage posts) unrelated to onboarding.
hallucinated_features.reason: Calendar feature changes were not requested for onboarding (REQ-9/10/11) and fall under non-goal of not redesigning existing features beyond necessary linking.
